categories: Category:Lords of the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Vantsuri Shia was a Sith High Lord native to the planet Kesh. Shia led the Lost Tribe of Sith infiltration team that took up residence in the newly abandoned Jedi Temple on Coruscant, under orders of Grand Lord Darish Vol. Shia commadeered her team from the former quarters of Jedi Grand Master Luke Skywalker.
